attributes.action: LIFT THE CAP ON HEALTH SPENDING
attributes.additional_details: I WOULD LIKE TO REQUEST THE LIFTING OF FINANCIAL CAPPING ON THE HEALTH SERVICE.  THIS IS A SERVICE THAT IS REQUIRED TO KEEP CURRENT PEOPLE OF THE UK AS HEALTHY AS POSSIBLE AND TO PREVENT ALL FUTURE GENERATIONS FROM BECOMING THE ILL HEALTH OF THE FUTURE. GOVERNMENTS NEED TO STOP MAKING THE HEALTH SERVICE JUSTIFY ITS COSTS!!!
